comments:
Hi,

I've downloaded the latest version of Eclipse 3.2.1 and unzipped it. Every time when I open the Eclipse platform a pop up window "Queueing viewer updates" with the only content "Error" is shown and the "Package Explorer" tab is empty except for the words "Unable to create view: java/text/ChoiceFormat". The following log file is written:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.core 4 4 2006-11-28 20:58:01.816
!MESSAGE Background Indexer Crash Recovery
!STACK 0
java.lang.InternalError: jzentry == 0,

 name = E:\Programme\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\jre\lib\rt.jar,
 i = 5498,
 message = invalid LOC header (bad signature)
	at java.util.zip.ZipFile$3.nextElement(ZipFile.java:429)
	at java.util.zip.ZipFile$3.nextElement(ZipFile.java:415)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.search.indexing.AddJarFileToIndex.execute(AddJarFileToIndex.java:193)

	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:595)


It seems to me that it is an eclipse bug?
Thank You
Lars

It looks like a problem with your installed JRE. ChoiceFormat could not be found. I think this can been seen in the last stack trace where the Java indexer fails to open the rt.jat archive.
Can you reinstall the JRE or try to start Eclipse with a different JRE (use eclipse -vm pathToJavaExecutable)?

Please reopen if this doesn't help.

traces.message: jzentry == 0,  jzfile = 7568480,  total = 12976,  name = E:\Programme\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\jre\lib\rt.jar,  i = 5498,  message = invalid LOC header (bad signature)
